Strings.Text: {scroll 2}Something is written on\nthe wall...{clear 0}Water=1, Red=2,\nPurple=3, Green=4{scroll 2}
{scroll 2}Will you put water in the\nempty bottle?{branch 0 6 1}
{scroll 2}\nThere's a UMB No. 2...{clear 0}Will you put UMB No. 2 in the\nempty bottle?{branch 0 6 1}
{scroll 2}\nThere's a UMB No. 4...{clear 0}Will you put UMB No. 4 in the\nempty bottle?{branch 0 6 1}
{scroll 2}There's UMB No. 2... You need\na container to obtain it...{scroll 2}
{scroll 2}There's UMB No. 4... You need\na container to obtain it...{scroll 2}
Do you want me to heal\nyour wounds?{scroll 1}{branch 0 6 0}
{scroll 0}Don't you know?\nIt's a large scale{scroll 2}{clear 55}{scroll 0}pharmaceutical company\nbased in Raccoon City.{scroll 2}{timed 115}
{scroll 0}\nI'm okay,{scroll 2}{clear 50}{scroll 0}but if something happens to\nme, please take care of me.{scroll 2}{timed 100}
{scroll 0}\nAre you alright?{scroll 2}{clear 60}{scroll 0}\nWant me to treat it?{scroll 2}{timed 60}
{scroll 2}There's UMB No. 2... But he\ncan't handle chemicals...{scroll 2}
{scroll 2}There's UMB No. 4... But he\ncan't handle chemicals...{scroll 2}
